channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Pot Hole on the inside of the road turning into Stephenson Close, 25th October
item.description:
This pot hole is large and deep It is in the direct wheel line of people driving into the road and with parking on the other side very little opportunity to avoid it if parking is there. When wet the pot hole is fully submerged and will cause extensive damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flag on lamppost on Thanet Road, outside no 13/15, 25th October
item.description:
This flag should not be there. No issue with it being on a main road or on private property but this is a side road and could inflame tensions with the occupants of that road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Thanet Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin On Fire, 25th October
item.description:
The bottom of the ashtray in the bin has fallen out and this has meant there have been multiple fires started in this bin. Local street trader have had the put the fires out at least once a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123 - 131, High Street, Plaistow, London

item.title: Leaning tree, 25th October
item.description:
This tree in the forest is dangerous, it's overhanging my property and branches keep falling into my garden. There is a risk to life and property, it needs to be cut down or heavily pruned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, West Woodside, Bexley, London

item.title: Dark spot around Redriff School / Russia Dock Woodland, 25th October
item.description:
Cow Lane needs morw lightingeapecially in this spot closer to the Park's entrance. In this spot on Cow Lane is a boy with their face covered and on the bike, in the evenings when is dark and early mornings when is quiet in shorter days of thw year mainly, as not seen him during the summer. We reported last year, suspecting him of waiting for victims to snatch their phones, as lots of phone covers were found underneath a car that has been parked there for a while. Last year there were more days where the Redriff School had their reflectors on and that made it safer. The boy has now started the rounds again and by installing a light in that dark spot, it will detter crime.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cow Lane, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 25th October
item.description:
I did report this hole before and someone did come and fill it up. They, unfortunately did a terrible job. Rather than fixing it, they simply did a patch job and filled it up. Bow the tarmac has come back out and the hole is dangerously low. Everyone has to drive round and avoid the hole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Queen Street Place, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet
